thinking.disposable_income: The Astrodome Area has relatively high median household income around $65,000, with many professionals working in the Texas Medical Center and surrounding institutions.
thinking.discretionary_consumption: Residents have moderate to high discretionary spending capacity, with significant retail and entertainment options in the area including NRG Stadium and various shopping centers.
thinking.accessibility: The area has good transit connectivity with multiple bus routes and METRORail Red Line, as well as excellent road access via Loop 610, Highway 288, and other major arteries.
thinking.decision_rationale: 1) Given the mixed-income population and good transit infrastructure, prioritized policies that balance moderate transit fares with improved service times 2) Selected options with moderate sales tax to maintain service quality without overly burdening retail spending 3) Supported modest driving fees to reduce congestion around major destinations 4) Considered that many residents commute to Medical Center and need reliable transit options 5) Factored in that the area hosts major events requiring efficient transportation systems
